ygData.subject: Re: Tuffer Tentacle Terrors
ygData.msgSnippet: hmmm I agree and disagree. I mean I use to hold to the same idea (and I even suggested it last night - lets just fight IN the room with the bonecracker and 2
ygData.messageBody:
hmmm I agree and disagree.

I mean I use to hold to the same idea (and I even suggested it last night -
lets just fight IN the room with the bonecracker and 2 necros, if we die we
die, but atleast we tried). I always thought that the traditional dungeon
crawl, that is go from room to room exterminating the enemy, is the best
way. BUT EQ doesn't allow that, things RESPAWN, so your back is never even
marginally safe.

Then I thought about it logically why do humans and demi-humans dominate the
world of Norrath and not orcs or goblins who seem to exist in profusion as
well, and are physically tuffer than us (we use weapons to hurt them and
wear armour, there natural strength and thick skin is good enough)?

It occurred to me its because we are smarter than them. If "pulling" can
neutralize part of the enemy attack then I think its a good thing, I think
its a good thing because it demonstrates WHY we rule the planet - we are
smart (comparatively speaking). Its also a solid tactical move, minimize
the enemies ability to attack you, have them come one at a time or have them
strung out.

So you have never pulled? or never been in a party that has?

> ----------
> From: Jason Coan[SMTP:coanj@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 10:53 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Tuffer Tentacle Terrors
>
> From: "Jason Coan" <coanj@...>
>
> THANK GOD, I think pulling monsters is lame...if you can't fight in the
> area, then you shouldn't be there....which in turn will help promote group
> play, rather than having a high level puller fetch a single monster at a
> time.
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Mifsud, Michael [mailto:Michael.Mifsud@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 8:48 PM
> > To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> > Subject: [warriors_eq] Tuffer Tentacle Terrors
> >
> >
> > From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> >
> > They seem to have made the Tentacle Terrors way more aggressive
> > and stronger
> > as well. I am level 21 and they are blue to white to me. My friend, a
> > level 30 ranger was helping me raise my 2handed skill (I just got a BBC)
> > with the TT. He would draw them out (they are green to him) and take
> all
> > the blows. They would consistently reduce him to one bubble and myself
> to
> > half my hit points.
> >
> > The day before they were a piece of cake, now there killing machines.
> >
> > They seem to have changed the linking also with the bonecracker.
> > It used to
> > be you could pull the BC and the two necros would not come (as
> > long as they
> > were green to the puller). Now they all come no matter what.
> >
> > AND finally blind spell pulling no longer works either. If you target a
> > mob, then run to another room (i.e. the mob cant see you) you could cast
> a
> > spell and the mob would come running. This no longer works.
> >
> > Just thought I would share that with you all.
> >
